channel.title: 01. 保持学习热情 on English Study
channel.description: Recent content in 01. 保持学习热情 on English Study

item.title: a. humans-of-new-york
item.description: He makes me want to know about little things, so that I can teach him. Like when we sit by this lake, I wish I knew what kind of turtle that was, so I could tell him. And I want to finger out what kind of duck that is, so I can tell him about it next time we come. What do you want most for him? Whatever his dreams are, I’m down to ride for him.

item.title: b. Expression and Convertion
item.description: Expression down to ride: support 课前作业 要求 熟读成诵 ，并回答下列问题。 1. 阅读理解/Comprehension Why does he want to know about litte things? he can teach his son. Did the man knows what kind of the turtle was? no, he didn’t Why did the man want to know about what the kind of duck that was?
